content.detailedDescription:
I was driving south on bothell-everett highway,a mile from downtown bothell, with a dark gray sky in front of me. a spot of gray sky started to glow, got brighter, then morphed in shape as if seen through heatwaves. then, a much darker spot shimmered in the center, and a few seconds later, a craft came through this darker spot, and moved to the right of the now bright spot. the morphing image gradually diffused until it disappeared, leaving just the craft motionless to the right of where the abnomaly had been. i had pulled over to watch this incredible sight for about 3 minutes. the craft remained stationary, but was sufficiently far enough away that i could not discern any details of shape, and was too far away to hear anything. as a pilot, i would estimate the distance from me at 5 miles. a 747 airliner
seemed to pass over this craft on its way into seatac airport on the base leg. the craft seemed to descend below the tree line, so i continued driving. as i neared downtown bothell, it was again visible, just sitting in the same spot as before. wish i had binoculars in my car. i am going to start carrying a set.

my reaction was at first, one of shock and awe at seeing such an incredible sight. i started to rationalize it as a regular aircraft, but the way the sky seemed to get so bright (when the sky was a thick gray) defies meterology, and the craft which came through, and then just stoped to the right of the anomaly. very strange, and the way the opening was ver bright, then had such a darker, shimmery center..

i've seen 3 other craft in my lifetime, but this was my first daylight sighting, and it was a real experience. please let me know if anyone else has seen this?
content.summary: Rift opened, craft came through

content.detailedDescription:
After reviewing the pictures i took earlier on the same day at the laguna beach, one picture caught my attention as i saw an unidentified object captured on the background. 

it was interesting since no one at the scene when i was taking this picture saw it. other pictures i took at the same location did not have this object either.

please see below for more information: 

1) i took this photo at laguna beach on october 12th, 2010 3:01 pm

2) i have first noticed this object when i was reviewing the pictures i took, which was the same day.

3) i could not relate this object to anything i know.

4) na - i do not kknow how its actions/motions were since it was only taken in one picture. the picture i took approximately 4 seconds later did not have this object on the background.

5) i have a mixed feeling as i think i took a picture of ufo!

6) the object was appeared on only one out of all the pictures i took that day.
content.summary: Unknown object taken by camera (did not see in eyes)

content.detailedDescription: Dark night, driving back to london, just saw this very bright flash about 45 degrees up from the horizon in the night sky. we were in the county of sussex near barcombe at the time.
content.summary: Very bright single white flash in the sky

content.detailedDescription:
I just looked out of my window and in the sky i saw what i can only describe as a small looking white comet, it had a very small and compact tail and the white light it was emitting would fade until it was gone and then it would just light up again?,all whilst travelling across the sky in the 10 mins that i observed it,i call it a comet because i cant think what else to call it and it did resemble one, it slowly crossed the sky until the shape of it resembled a disk shape,but i think this was because of the angle i was looking from,can't be sure, but within a few more seconds i couldn't see it anymore.

i saw this "comet" at 6.00pm bst in barry,s.Wales,uk, and it went in the direction of the west!

my camera is not so good so i couldn't take a picture or film it unfortunately!
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: It looked like a white comet with a compact tail flying very slowly across the sky!

content.detailedDescription:
Traveling home on n rt 41 in the avondale area saw these lights going across sky, many people also saw them and stopped along side of the road. they were going fast (good speed)
to many to be airplanes we thought, thought it was a weird sight

i have a pix of one of the lights, but do not have my phone with me to download.
content.summary: Red-orange lights, more than 100 scattered going across sky, some together, some not

content.detailedDescription:
On saturday, october 23, 2010, my wife and i were traveling in our suv heading down 141w (peachtree parkway) at approximately 11:25am est.  we were approximately 3 miles from our destination when my wife, who was sitting in the front passenger seat stated she sees something in the sky that she can't identify.  i asked her to describe it and she really couldn't, just that's she's never seen anything like it.  i then peer out the window for a glance and notice the object.  i take a double and then triple-take.  it was silver in color.  at times it looked cigar shaped but the more we looked at it, it appeared more of a disk.  it's hard to tell exactly how high in the sky it was but i would say it was about the same altitude as a low flying plane.  the object was not really moving, it appeared stationary.  it was not an airplane, nor helicopter, bi-plane, weather-balloon, flare or anything else of the sort.  we were on our way to get our daughter's hair cut for the first time, so we brought our digital camera.  my wife got it out quickly and took the first snapshot.  the camera focused on her window so it came out blurry.  the next time i told her to zoom in as far as she could go and try to take another picture.  she did, and the attached picture is the result.  my wife looked at the picture she just took and by the time she looked back up at the object (less than 10 seconds had transpired) was completely out of site.  we spent the next couple minutes looking out the windows as we were driving to see if we could again spot it but to no avail.  it was definitely gone.

about 25 minutes go by and we are finished getting our daughter's hair cut.  we drive back on 141 although in the opposite direction.  as we neared the location where we originally sited the object, we began to look for it again.  amazingly, we spot it, in the same general vicinity, although this time it's traveling in the opposite direction and moving at a slow but steady speed.  i immediately find a parking lot to pull into; it was a church.  as i'm about to park the car, the object is in full site, again, moving relatively slow.  i take an additional 10 seconds to turn the car 180 degrees into a parking spot.  by the time my wife and i get out of the car, the object is now nearly out of sight in the far horizon.  i couldn't even spot it anymore and it was my wife (with her better far sight) that spotted it way off in the distance for a couple seconds before it again disappeared.

in sum, my wife is a ufo skeptic.  i was amazed that she was so into this object and she only would have been if it was an extreme anomaly.  the shape and variable speeds of the object is most perplexing.  to note, as we got back on 141 to drive home, we noticed a black helicopter fly directly overhead at a few hundred feet.  when you look at the picture, you will notice a phone/electrical line running across.  directly below is the object.  when zooming in, you will immediately notice black bands/spots towards either end.  i forwarded the picture to my father late last night, who is an engineer and frequently has contracts with nasa and other aeronautical associations, and he too is states that it is unlike anything he's ever seen.  please let me know if you have any further questions and i would appreciate knowing whether anything was reported in the sky by any other agency.  thanks and good luck.
content.summary: Unidentified flying object spotted in daylight over cumming, ga

content.detailedDescription: My friend, a wedding videographer was filming a wedding reception for a friend who just got married. the location was called the reef in the marina area of long beach california. the date was september the 4th, 2010. the time was between 12 and 12:30 pm. it was a clear sky, and a beautiful day. as the videographer was filming the wedding reception, he panned left getting a view of the harbor, and tilted up slightly. in the frame for 10 seconds were two groups of very brightly colored orbs in a huge circle. they could be clearly seen, and appeared to be quite low. the videographer panned the camera to the right, then quickly back to the left. they were gone, just that fast. the videographer did not realize that he had captured footage of ufos. it was during the editing of the wedding video, to the videographer's amazement. that he realized he captured video of objects that are truly out of this world. the videographer who is a friend of mine. called me on the evening of october 18th, or the 19th. he was excited, exclaiming "i filmed the aliens, i filmed th aliens". i asked him, "what are you talking about". he then went on to tell me what he discovered, during the editing of the wedding video. today is friday the 22nd of october, today is my first time examining the ufo footage. i have to say, i believed it to be an authentic sighting. these ufos were caught on video camera inadvertently. now you decide.
content.shape: Circle,   Diamond,   Fireball,   Flash,   Oval,   Sphere,   Star-like
content.summary: Two groups of ufos in a huge circle that were glowing in the mid afternoon in long beach ca sept 4, 2010

content.detailedDescription:
At home on front porch looking at night sky through 3rd generation night vision goggles . 
i was looking west of my location when noticed a bright flicker of light to the north . 
then another bright flick of light . 
craft just appeared from the flash of light . 
from a dead stop it started off south an a steady clip an continued south untill i could no longer see it . 
triangle shaped craft with round light on each corner .
black . lights seemed like they were on low . no noise . 
caught off guard by what i witnessed . usually see birds,bats,planes,satellites or points of light moving fast that can not be identified.
content.summary: Bright flash of light ,triangle craft appeared ,headed from north to south

content.detailedDescription:
On sat, two of us were at the back of a friend's property having cigarettes
when i became aware that there were 2 very bright stars some 25deg to the right of an extremely clear & bright jupiter. i knew there were no bright pairs of stars in that section of sky.

these were close together about <=1 lunar diameter and they appeared to be mostly stationary or very slight movement "on the spot". left "star" was slightly higher than the right by only a few degrees. this pair was about hhalf as jupiter so i guess mag 1 or -1.

ii also put the elevation to be around 40deg from my position in frisco. this would put them over plano or richardson if the altitude was great. i stood there watching and i commented to my friend that "those stars shouldn't be there" and wondered if a planet had moved to a position near another star.

both were white, there was no discernable disc, no flashing or noise.

heres the interesting part - i watched for some 5mins and the one on the right started to fade and so did the one on the left. but the other stars around them did not. within 10-20secs both stars faded on the spot and were "gone".

i checking on their last postion several times in the next hours but  there was nothing more to be seen. i checked to see if the iss was in the sky and it was not.

has anyone else reported these objects ?

thankyou,
content.summary: Two bright lights observed stationary elev 40  due south - . both -1mag.

content.detailedDescription:
Appeared to be 2 to 6thousand feet in altitude blue sphere moving in a strait line. no sound as large as your pinki finger nail when heald at a far. i was on the phone, just as it was over my head directly up i asked my friend "don't all airplanes have red lights and strobes?" he says "yes" so i go get my father. my nabor hears me yelling at my father "get out here if you want to see something very cool"

neighbor rushes out as well just in time to see the object after it passed over head. object moving from west south west toward east north east. object moved about 10 miles and began to get smaller. and i do not mean smaller as in because it was getting farther away thus appeared smaller. i mean as in the light or object was actually getting smaller and smaller till a point at which its smallest it turns red and then vanished. did not vanish because it went out of sight it vanished because the light slowly faded down, turns red and then turns off. 

i woudl have thought it looked like a re entry except no tail nor any red color from heat. 

another possibility my father brought up was perhaps a space station reflecting the sunlight as it got farther over earth, earth blocking the sunlight the light fades away. so it woudl be a good idea to research the path of orbit of the space station and see if it is consistant with this sighting. also was it over hawaii during this time and date. 

however i saw two sattlights moments after the object on an orbit from south to north and both of them clearly in orbit looked hundreds of times farther upward than this object. this object appeared to be right over head. as i said looked to me like it was between 3 and 6 thousand feet up no more. 

its possible it was a re entry of some kind. this would explain the light being so bright and then faiding away. though i want to make clear over the 10 mile path the light did not faid one single bit. it only began to faid after the end of the 10 miles. once it began to faid it was only seconds till it went red and then out completely. 

if this was a re entry i would wonder why an object woudl be re entering earth right over maui. 

i sure would like to see some research into the possibilities such as the path of the space station to conferm or eliminate that theory. ect..

thank you
content.summary: Very large blue, looked like very large planet in night sky, only moving.

content.detailedDescription:
I and my friends were driving over garden state parkway, nj. we took the exit to paterson i believe its 155p and suddenly my friend noticed some white light in the sky. inititially we thought someone is throwing light in the sky or it is related to security lights. but later we saw that there were four white lights each of which was pretty huge in size. these lights would get spread apart from each other an then cluster back together. we drove for around 5 to 6 miles and they were above our car all this time playing in the sky in the same way, spreading apart and then clustering back together. this lasted for almost 15 to 20 minutes until they started fading away.

thanks!
content.summary: Four white round lights going in circle, clustering together and spreading apart

content.detailedDescription: I was on my deck calling in my dogs at 7:03pm est.  my deck faces south.  i was observing the night sky.  the moon was at 70 degrees and 10 degrees above the horizon.  it was waning gibbous with 100% of the moon's visible disk illuminate.  the sky had a scattered layer of very thin clouds.  jupiter was visible at about 130 degrees and 25 above the horizon.  the 2 star-like objects were at 170 degrees and about 20 degrees above the horizon.  the objects were stacked one above the other.  the sky was very clear in this part of the sky. the temperature was about 50 degrees and there was no wind.  the objects were about 2/3rds the size and brightness and color as jupiter.  the top object was slightly to the right of the bottom object.  i observed the objects slightly move towards the horizon.  they did not appear to be attached but moved in formation.  the distance between the objects was about the thickness of my thumb while extend my arm.  i observed for less than a minute.  i then went in my house and upstairs to the master bedroom to get to get my wife to observe the objects out of the southern window and they were no longer visible.  i also went back down stairs with my wife and the objects were gone.
content.summary: 2 star-like objects in formation

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were watching the nlcs game on t.V. the inning ended so we went outside to smoke a cigarette. we saw the lites of 3 planes approcing from the south east. we turned to watch them as they were passing, looking toward the north west. my wife saw it first and asked "whats that" when i saw what she was looking at it appeared to be two balloons turning end over end around each other. following slightly above and behind we saw the lights of another plane which looked like it was following. they came from noth west to south east. i asked my wife to get my binochs which she did. when i looked thru them they were turnning over each other, moving to fast to be balloons on a still night. they were not lit. no lights. just the reflection of the city lights on them. we didn't notice any noise from them, although the sound of the planes may have drowned out any other sounds. when they went out of our sight we came back inside and i checked the time, 7:20 pm. they did not change direction or speed, just kept going until we chould no longer see them. it was obvious they were not bolloons, esp. in the binochs. just weird. i am reporting this because i whould like to know if anyone else saw them too.
content.summary: Two orbs revolving around each other

content.detailedDescription:
This is a picture from a construction web cam at the shreveport/bossier port.  the camera takes pic every 45 min. i just happen to look at 10:30 this morning and saw this.

in the next pic it was gone.

i dont know what it is but looks like a disk to me, blur from motion.

if you zoom in there are three smaller object in front of it, could be birds i dont know.....

thought you would be interested, i know i was.

link to construction cam. *(link moved to additional evidence section below -- cms/sg.
content.summary: Picture from construction web cam

content.detailedDescription: Had just finished dinner and was called outside to witness an orange globe moving steady from south to north,would describe the orb as being on fire,had also witnessed the same thing on 4th of july on the same path,except there were two orbs with multiple sightings from all over the u.S. quite the stange object hope to hear of more sightings,this was witnessed by 5 people on 10/22/10 object cotinued steady util was out of sight
content.summary: Orange orb approx.400 ft off the ground moving from south to north

content.detailedDescription: At approx 2100 hrs on 21 october 2010, i was on my back porch looking at sagittarius (which was in a northeasterly direction). i noticed an object moving across the torso towards the moon (located south east of me and was a almost full). the object appeared as a star in brightness and shape. as it proceeded towards the moon, it stopped abruptly about half way. then just as quickly as it stopped it faded away from sight. i did observe three aircraft flying north-northeast of me at the time of the sighting. one aircraft was heading due north, the second due west, and the third south-southeast. the third aircraft did fly near the spot where i saw the object disappear, however it was approx 1-2 minutes after the object disappeared. it did also appear to be a significantly lower altitude then the object had been at.
content.summary: Star like object over washington, ia

content.detailedDescription: Around 10 pm, oct. 21st, i was looking at the night sky from a third-story balcony. in the eastern sky were, 3 lights,in a perfect vetical line, and a bright light to the left flashing red. to the right,at exactly the same distance, was a flashing blue light. all lights were a perfect distance from one another.  i called 3 of my friends outside to confirm. four of us saw the lights,and the red and blue ons appeared to be pulsing, or moving up and down. they weren't stars,or airplanes or sattelites. they held the same position for a couple hours at least, not moving with the stars or moon. 2 hours later, they were gone. any comments? thanks, *(wit's initials deleted -- cms/sg.
content.summary: Unknown objects in sky, total of five hovering lights

content.detailedDescription:
1st saw the ufo while returning from a family meal, driving in a car. later as well when i got home about 10 mins later. it looked as though there was a burning on the outside of the object. 

i noticed it in the sky as it was fast moving towards the east heading over towards ireland and america way.

after about 3 mins of observing it seamed to fade out of existence.

it had a very defined flight path and looked as though a satellite was dropping out of orbit and burning up on entry

my first thinking was either the earth had sped up and the stars were moving faster but that is obviously ridiculous, second though was grab my camera but by the time i had returned and set up my camera it had faded to black.
content.summary: Orange-red sphere flying at high alt

content.detailedDescription:
I contacted someone on the phone today at mufon about an incident my cousin and i observed. she gave me your name and email.  i am a 58 year old man with good sense and eyesight. my cousin is 56 and has good eyesight and good sense also. please feel free to pass this email to anyone who could help me.

the event i am about to describe was witnessed by my cousin and myself and first noticed at 7:15 pm cdt on october 17th, 2009, a date and time of an occurrence that it seems i will never forget. to help me put closure on the event,  i have been encouraged by my cousin who also witnessed the event, and others to write this report over a year after it occurred. about 7:15 pm cdt on a clear evening,  just after sunset, we noticed a large bright close group of  lights to the wnw of my country home 10 miles south of hale center, texas . it appeared to be a very bright white-blue light cluster at about a 45 degree angle from the horizon.  although it was hard to distinguish individual lights, it appeared to be a cluster of 4 lights with a total brightness equal to total of 4-5 times the steady brightness of the planet venus if it were at its peak illumination period. the lights appeared very close together, almost one, with what seemed like  three very close bright lights on top, and one very near bright light on the bottom. it nearly seem to have an over all shape of a upside-down bright triangle, or what could have been an upside-down tetrahedron shape if the lines were connected between the very close lights. as i said, the lights appeared very close together from our view point and perspective and almost seemed to be one. the lights did not move, or have any  streaming vapor trails, so we quickly ruled out a jet airplane of any kind, military or jet airliner, besides it was much too bright. we have often seen jets, commercial and military, and are familiar with the point of a jet and its vapor trails.  the lights stayed at the same position and brightness for what seemed 10 minutes as we stared and commented how we had never personally seen anything in the sky like this every before in our 50+  years here on this earth. after  another minute or two, the lights seemed to dim a little, the bottom light seemed to dim very much.  then, below the three lights on top, in the position of the bottom fourth light, a small group of what appeared to be small light bluish-grey actively bubbling blob of clouds (like a raspberry shape or a round bunch of grapes) about what seemed to be the size of an english pea or shirt button at arms length.  to describe this further let me say it looked like a like a small bubbling light blue/grey-silver raspberry on which the individual seeds of the raspberry seemed to exploding randomly with flashes of light over and over again. the cloud cluster seemed to have the many bubbles exploding, also looking like boiling syrup. this bubbly mass appeared in seconds right out of the clear dark blue october sky in and below the place of the lower fourth bright blue light. the little bubbles, or raspberry seeds, in my analogy  seemed to be exploding in this cloudy mass, and it would take about a second for what would be each the seeds on a raspberry to flash, expand, bust, and start new little bubbles over and over again (like boiling). this went on for about 15 seconds or so, when the bottom  of this little cloud mass seemed to flatten out forming what looked like a bubbling half sphere of raspberry shape. the flat bottom immediately started making expanding concentric rings, like what forms when a drop of water hits a puddle. out of the bottom of the bubble mass, in the center of the expanding eccentric circles, appeared a dull red orb-like light.  it moved to a distance one diameter of  the size of the bubbling mass before stopping and hovering momentarily below the bubbling cloud mass and top 3 bright bluish white lights.   the bubble clouds had returned to their raspberry shape within seconds and was no longer flat on the bottom. then the dim red light moved down another diameter of the bubbling raspberry mass started moving erratically, zigzagging  in the small area below the mass.  after several seconds, the red light moved up again and disappeared behind the bubbling mass of clouds while flashing in sequence with the small explosions of individual bubbles, which still had its bright lights on top. the red light then re-appeared on top from behind the bubbling mass, and came out  above the top 3 white lights. at this moment there was a dimming of the bright lights and bubble cloud mass, and the red light hovered for a second or two above the white lights and bubbles.  then everything suddenly faded out within a second.  the bright top lights, the bubbling raspberry cloud mass , and the small dim red orb light, all gone, leaving only the darkened evening sky with its stars beginning to come out. there were no weather clouds in that visible area of the sky.  the time all this ended was about 7:25 -7:30 pm cdt.  all of this time, this event was in the same position, wnw, and at a 45 degree angle to the horizon, as viewed  from my house here in the country south of hale center.
 
my cousin and myself talked about our sighting as described above for the next week. we could not get the images out of our minds.  there was no mention of this event on the television, or newspapers about this to my knowledge.  we just could not believe we were the only ones who could have witness such an amazingly visible sight in the early evening sky. 
 
that���s when found the mufon web sight. finally today i decided to call the mufon telephone number a little more than a year after all our sightings in texas panhandle and bordering eastern new mexico. we had searched the mufon data base and found out there were about 5-6 other people who had what must have been the same sighting, at the same time, in the same area geographically,  just from different observation points.  to see these same earlier reported mufon incidents, use only the search parameters of the event date and the state ( 10-17-2009 to 10-17-2009) and enter texas as the state. then search new mexico and event date 10-17-2009 to 10-17-2009). you can see one event observation was in clovis/portales area of new mexico, and one from hobbs, new mexico.  in the texas search, you will find another observation in amarillo, and perhaps my report will be on your sight soon.  note that the new mexico mdt times are an hour earlier than we are here in hale center, texas cdt.
hobbs, new mexico  reported the incident to the ne (perhaps it could have been nne). in clovis/portales area it appeared to the east. amarillo reported it to the sw (perhaps it could have been ssw), and finally we reported it here 10 miles of  the hale center area at wnw at 45 degrees above the horizon. all of these sights point to the same area of texas.
 
get your map out. using a little triangulations and interpolations of these sightings points of 4 other mufon reports of this incident, together with our on sighting of this same event, we can calculate using geometry, the height and distance from our observation point here 10 miles south of  hale center, texas.  we can calculate not only the distance and height about the horizon, but using trigonometry we can also get  a real good approximation of size of the this object with its bright lights and bubbling mass and even the red orb light. we can even approximate the red orb light size in addition to the top lights with its attached bubbling mass of clouds. these triangulating and interpolating all the sightings including my own in combination point to the same area on the texas map (approximately 10-15 miles ese of muleshoe, texas (for estimates use 12 miles) , texas and about  miles to the wnw of my house 10 miles south of hale center, tx).  by triangulating our sighting and the sightings of others allowed us to put the distance on the object about  miles from my house using the flat land distance to the point directly below the lights and blob. since it was at a 45 degree angle from my horizon, together with the observation triangulations and interpolations, the observed object was approximately 42-47 miles ( for estimates use 45 miles ) wnw  from my house or about 10-15 miles to the ese of muleshoe, tx). 

 {by letting the right angle of a right triangle be directly  below the object  of about 12 miles ese if muleshoe, tx.   if the observation point at my house was at a 45 degree angle from the horizon,  it would mean that the leg of the triangle measuring altitude would also be about 42-47 miles (for estimates use 45 miles) above the earth the other leg that is about to my house.  geometrically, right triangles with a 45 degrees angles in them have equal sides, that would be altitude and the distance. i wish i was there to explain this in person, but make a triangle by connecting the points from my house here near hale center to 10-15 miles (for estimates use 12 miles) ese of  muleshoe texas as the first point. the second point of this right triangle is directly above the 12 miles ese of muleshoe. the third point of the right triangle is my house 10 miles south of  hale center, tx, and the second point is directly above first point (or above the map or earth) at the point on the ground 12 miles ese of muleshoe, texas. that describes the right triangle where i can show that the height of the object observed at 45 degrees above my horizon is the same length as the leg from my house 10 miles south of hale center to the estimated point 12 miles ese of muleshoe.}

so, so far, in summary, i have proven the object was  wnw of me, and  miles high above 12 miles ese of muleshoe, texas. ( since my angle of observation was 45 degrees above my horizon). now using trigonometry we can roughly calculate the approximate diameter of the light cluster and blob, both of  which made about a 2-2.5 degree viewing angle ( remember it was about the size of a shirt button held at arms length, or about the size of a english pea at arms length) . in order for the object to be our observed size,  making a 2-2.5 degree arch, the size of the bright lights and light blue-grey-silvery raspberry-like bubbling clouds) and object by my rough trigonometry would be about 2-3 miles in diameter. that is bluish- bright white lights, and light blue grey silvery bubbling cloud mass an astonishing 2-3 miles in diameter.
the red light was small, and was not as bright as the blue-white lights. the  red orb-like light appeared a dull silvery red color. the red orb light did not radiate bright radians like the  bright blue-white lights points at the top of the bubble cloud.  using rough trigonometry the red orbs size would have to be in the neighborhood of approximately 1175-1465 feet across  by its corresponding size to the rest of the light and bubbles of 2-3 miles diameter. (if my trigonometric calculations are correct, i hope). 

to comment a bit further on the red orb light���s size, it did seem to be about the same size as the seeds (the individual bubbles of the mass below the sparkling bright white lights). it was about the same size as the bubbling exploding seeds on the raspberry shape.  each of the exploding raspberry seeds in the bubble clouds were about the same size as the red orb-like light that appeared below them.

i am exhausted.  i must quit for a while. i would be glad to make drawings if somebody show me how to do it best. my geometry is good. the trigonometry i could use someone to recheck my figures on the size of the various shapes observed by us.  i also would like to say i am disturbed by this haunting observation, and feel like that my writing this will someday help me with some kind of closure for my mind. perhaps someone can help me through contacts using mufon.

ps. forgive my rambling and re-iterations.  also, you might observe i am not too good at proof reading.  i hope my descriptions make sense.  please forgive the sentence structure and grammar. please feel free to pass this email to anyone who could help me and direct replies through the dfw chapter of mufon attention state director, *(name and email address removed--cms/sg.  thanks
content.shape: Circle,   Diamond,   Flash,   Sphere,   Star-like,   Teardrop,   Triangle,   Other,   Unknown
content.summary: Bright lights, bubbling cloud mass,dull red/silvery orb-like light

content.detailedDescription:
I was fishing one night on avery lake. it was pitch dark.The only way i could find the boat launch was looking for camp fires next to it.I had no boat lights. i think it was in august 2009.All of a sudden it was day light for a split second. then i heard this boom boom boom boom boom. way off in the distance.Had no idea what it was.The next day a alpena radio station.Said a possible meteor hit west of them. that is were i live.And thats all that about it. they did tell the deer hunters to look for a strange rock in the snow it might worth something. around late november. i was staying sister and brother in law.Hear in atlanta. iwas waiting for my home to be set up. my sister does not allow smokeing in her house.So at night i would stand outside on the front porch. frezzeing to death and look up at the cold clear sky.And watch for satelights. i wouid always see one or two.No city lights the night sky is real clear. i started to see this bright light light so bright you could not make out a shape.Not big probaly hovering. at the altitude of a helecopter. only it was flying in a straight line real slow. no sound no beakon lights. i saw it two other times once with my sister and once with my brother inlaw.Doing the same thing never flew fast or zig zag. it wold fly slow straght. watch it for a while then go dark. one morning in december around 5am it was to cold to smoke outside. i went to the back door proped the storm door open with my foot and held my cigarette out side. so that no smoke came into the house. while i was standing there looking through the glass it was dark. a ball of light with a dark ball in the center. started comeing down wright in front of me about 50 feet away. it coming down sort of fast steady and controlled. it was so bright almost blinding. but when it went down behind the pine trees. nothing around it would light up. i lost sight of it.I have deer cams set up in my back yard night vision and still pictures.That trip when a deer comes in contact.I have caught these balls of light on video and still pictures. they are all over my property. these things are starteing to scare me and make mad. i caught one on still photo  . this is oct 23 2010. the thing is on the ground not  lite up you can make out the ball with the dark center and the deer is stareing right at it. i have no idea what these things are. but iam about ready to get  my rifel and start hunting balls of light. iam 56 years old i dont drink and i dont drug. and iam not crazy.

i video of the ball moveing by a deer and still photos of the light around cant figure out how to send them.
content.summary: Bright ball with a dark center ball

content.detailedDescription:
what i saw along with two bystanders for confirmation.

 were two huge triangles drifting along the atlantic coast.

 they were the size of a football field with a "orb" following

 them they hovered over the beach area at a very high altitude!

 they were transparent, they stopped for 30 minutes drifted slowly

 it was quite a spectacle, i'll never forget it!
content.summary: Two tr3's

content.detailedDescription:
We left our apartment in alexandria, and thought we saw fireworks from the south/south-west at first.  there were four lights with trailing tails, like a meteor.  then the four objects sort of hovered, and the trails caught up/disappeared because they were no longer falling.  then one died out or something, because there were only three.  they then seemed to just drift and move laterally at times, and when they did there would be a short trail for a second.  this lasted for about 2 minutes or so, as we drove and caught sight of them between buildings.  during this time they seemed to be drifting downwards.  eventually we lost sight of them for about 1/2 a minute, and when we had a clear view again, they were gone.

we have a few thoughts about what they could have been.  they seemed to just south of the pentagon perhaps, so at first we thought they were praticing for an air show, but then planes don't move like that.  transformers three has been filming, but we still don't know what that could have been, and why'd they'd film near the pentagon, if in fact that's where it was.  we're really just looking for an explanation.
content.summary: Seemed at first to just be 4 meteors or fireworks, which then hovered, and moved laterally with short trails behind.  slowly drifted down.

content.detailedDescription:
i went to the end of my driveway to get the newspaper, the sky was still dark. i noticed a small triangle of lights that had a strange blinking pattern (blink, blink....Blink)and were brighter than typical planes i've seen. object seemed to be located ese of salt lake (north of me, in sandy)and was headed north-to-south (towards me. i'm unsure of it's altitude, as the only reference i had were the clouds, which it was below.) the sky was too dark to allow me to see an outline beyond the lights, but the lights moved in unison and gave me the impression they were 3 lights on one vessel, as opposed to 3 vessels in formation. it did seem to be traveling about half-again (150%) as fast as typical planes. after almost 2 minites, the object paused in mid-blink and, when it resumed blinking, was moving at the same speed east-to-west. i saw it for another 30 seconds (appox) then it stopped blinking. (remaining in the pattern.) it was still too dark to see any outline, and i'd figure a plane would'nt have turned thier lights off yet.)
 about a minute after i first noticed the object i was still assuming it was a plane, but i started to video it on my camera phone (just in case.) video is available, but i did not see anything on it.
 an airplane did fly in a somewhat similar path about 15 minutes after the sighting. that was a commercial airplane, still flashing it's lights (different color, pattern and sequence.) i could clearly see the fuselage outline by this time. it seemed to being flying higher than the object was, but still below the cloud cover.
content.summary: Nocturnal lights, sudden direction change. odd flash pattern.

content.detailedDescription: Husband and i just left joes crab shack ventura ca. we had the best crab feast ever (but no alcohol). we went down the hill (sanjon st)towards a dead end towards the beach. we stopped at the stop sign to turn left. over the ocean (just south of us) we both saw a large cigar shaped (gray in color) object hovering over the ocean and then it started moving towards the direction of land (semi fast). we tried to drive along the beach and track it down to take a picture, but by time we got to the beach area at seward, it was too far down to take a picture or see clearly. this thing seemed like a giant barge or something in the sky. it was huge! seemed too long and too flattend (cigar not round) to be a blimp or plane. no other aircraft was in the sky. i thought it was a cloud formation (it was cloudy) at first until we saw it moving, gliding smoothly, but a good speed twords land. this was a first for us.
content.summary: Large gray cigar shaped object hovering over ocean

content.detailedDescription: While driving on route 25 north towards trumbull, i was taking a few pictures to show the hues of the leaves to friend. nothing was noticed in the pictures at the time. however, when looking at the pictures on the iphone a oval dark shape is present traveling from left to right in the sky. i do not recall seeing any birds flying by at that time since it was very cold and windy outside. see attached images for details.
content.summary: Oval ufo caught on iphone photograph

content.detailedDescription: Around 1:30 am on october 23,2010 i was walking with my cousin down south pine st in ishpeming mi we were heading north on south pine st. as i looked ahead i saw a round green light it appeared to be coming straight down as if to land slowly almost like it was floating at this point i thought it was a firework of sort then all of the sudden it shot up and in a northward direction at that point the action was almost like a shooting star but in an upward away movement and disappeared faster than it appeared. my cousin and i turned to each other in amazement and were both saying the same thing "did you see that". we thought through all possibilities and the only thing we can come up with is a ufo.
content.summary: It was a brief sighting of the lighted object

content.detailedDescription: I was walking in ishpeming, michigan by lake angeline at 1:30 am.  it was a perfectly clear night, and in front of me and a friend i saw a bright green light in the sky.  at first it looked like a fire work, or a flare floating in the air.  before i had time to decide what it looked like, it stopped briefly, and flew straight away from us, heading almost due north.  as it was flying away i could make out a circular shape, with four distinct green lights in a circle.  it happened so fast that i wasn't sure what i saw at first, and we just stood there looking at each other dumb founded.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: I saw a green light fall from the sky like a flare, then stop and fly away from me to the north.

content.detailedDescription: I just laid down for bed, and have no curtains in my bedroom windows. my wife just closed her eyes and i was just staring out front window, which faces south east. a bright bluish whitish irregular shaped orb "slowly" moved its way across my view, then seemingly exploded lighting up the entire sky. absolutely no noise could be heard. object was traveling much slower than a meteorite, and seemed to be traveling horizontally. i'd put it about 45 degrees above horizon. i was sort of confused by what i was seeing and by the time my wife had opened her eyes, the eent was well over.
content.summary: Slower than meteorbright blueish/white, exploded

content.detailedDescription: Looked like approaching planes veering off course in circular motion heading for a very faint star object or direction suddenly disappearing - turning off their lights.  2 objects observed - exact same trajectory and approach - circular motion toward the 'faint star' within 2 minutes.
content.summary: Looked like approaching planes suddenly disappearing

content.detailedDescription:
My wife and i were sitting in our living room which has a lot of frontal and overhead glass.  it was dark outside, about 8:20 pm.  i was at my computer, which faces the windows.  my wife was watching tv which sits in front of the big bank of windows.  she said "what is that?", and i looked up to see the bright lights approaching from the south.  they were spherical balls of light with a steady non-blinking glow of very bright yellow to amber. they came at first in two sets of two, at what seemed  a normal altitude for average civilian aircraft in this airspace.  there is a small  airport, (skagit regional airport), nearby.  a military airbase, (naval air station whidbey island), is nearby.  we frequently see and hear aircraft.  military fa18,  and ea6b aircraft often, and sometimes heavy transports.  small and large commercial jet aircraft, and light civilian aircraft come and go over our home.  in addition we see helicopter life flight medical airlift activity between bellingham to the north and seattle to the south.  search helicopters work the bay and beaches several times a year as boaters, hunters, and commercial fishermen go missing.  these objects appeared different than any of the familiar aircraft. we quickly stepped outside onto our west facing deck as the appearance of the objects was strange.  they had no blinking navigation lights nor any form of visible landing or search lights.  i expected to hear engines, and at first actually thought perhaps they would turn out to be helicopters.  when we stepped out the door we both immediately realized there was no sound and there were none of the usual blinking lights seen on all other aircraft.   these bright glowing orbs, or round lights were in the neighborhood of four times as large to our perception as the brightest refinery light across the bay.  they moved steadily and smoothly with no erratic maneuvering, coming straight up from the south, and then one by one curving off to the west and nw, and then gradually diminishing in brightness, as we thought they were gradually obscured by the cloud cover.  the level of visibility decreased faster after the turn to the wnw. than the increase in brightness as they moved toward us from the south.  they might have also been climbing in altitude as they moved away.. it was calm outside with little or no breeze, no rain, a certain amount of reflected light in the sky from the refineries and the city of anacortes across the bay reflecting off a high cloud cover.  i said "get the binoculars", and then went to grab our digital camera. it seemed strange and unreal, i was excited, and fumbled as i tried to take a picture.  the exposure was too slow.  i gave the camera to my wife, as she had some experience taking movies.  i used the binoculars to view the second set of two objects directly in front and above to the west of us as the first two objects each turned out to the west and gradually vanished, seemingly into the high cloud cover.  my wife managed a fleeting capture of one or more of the glowing lights at the beginning and end of her filming attempt. very poor and short glimpses of light.  i could only see bright intense yellow and amber light through the binoculars. the third glowing light turned away to the northwest and  gradually vanished.  our neighbor close by  to the north came out on his deck in time to see the last of the objects .  he went to get a spotting scope, but the last of the glowing lights was gone when he returned.  it had turned away to the nw toward the georgia straight and also gradually vanished, seemingly into the cloud cover.  a few minutes after the sighting we heard and observed a commercial jet aircraft as it flew out to the nw. and then turned toward bellingham .  this craft did not disappear into the cloud cover.  making us think the objects we had seen could have been bigger and higher than we had at first thought the whole sighting lasted no more than a couple of minutes, if that.  we acknowledged to each other, and the neighbor that what we had seen could only be classified as ufo phenomena.  we decided that we should make some kind of report.  i had heard of mufon and looked up the sight on line, and this is my report.
*(wit's name removed--cms/sg) 10:20 pm,  10/22/10
content.summary: Four silent glowing orbs of bright light amber traveling over padilla bay
